snippet: “Bridesmaids,” which also received a best ensemble nomination from the Screen Actors Guild, may have a good shot to be included in the Oscar derby.
abstract: “Bridesmaids,” which also received a best ensemble nomination from the Screen Actors Guild, may have a good shot to be included in the Oscar derby.

headline.main: 'Bridesmaids,' 'Ides of March' Get a Little Help From Producers Guild
